title: (x) "Funhouse" font - House Industries {Yves}
content:
Mjellow,   
   
Can anybody tell me who made the Funhouse font?   
Look at the headlines here [http://www.fanta.dk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20101101114202/http:/www.fanta.dk/)   
   
Thanks in advance people!   
/Henriko
author: henriko
